creator: fernando.olcoz@eess.madrid.cepsa.es
text:
The exception "javax.servlet.ServletException: URL contains encoded special 
chars." is raised when trying to "View All Contexts" in the context 
administration tool. The problem seems located in class ContextAdmin, method 
getContextInfo(String contextName), in the lines that call RequestUtil.URLDecode
().

Replacing the line:

v.addElement("WORK DIR: " + RequestUtil.URLDecode(context.getWorkDir().getName
()));

with

v.addElement("WORK DIR: " + context.getWorkDir().getName());

and

v.addElement("ATTRIBUTE: " + RequestUtil.URLDecode(context.getAttribute
(key).toString()));

with

v.addElement("ATTRIBUTE: " + context.getAttribute(key).toString());

seems to fix the problem.

creator: fernando.olcoz@eess.madrid.cepsa.es
text:
The bug may be more serious if it affects 
org.apache.tomcat.util.RequestUtil.URLDecode(), which may well be the case.
